author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-All About to offer off-floor distribution of shares
text:
March 2(Reuters) - All About Inc
* Says it will offer an off-floor distribution of 676,000 shares on Tokyo Stock Exchange between March 9 and March 13
* Offering price will be determined based on the closing share price of the day before the distribution
* Says the limitation for distribution is up to 10,000 shares for each customer
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/dW37aM
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
